DOC.brief_summary: The aim randomize control trial investigate effect Swedish Internet-based treatment program individual general population regular cannabis use . The primary hypothesis test use Internet-based treatment program associate cannabis-free day comparison access information cannabis use harmful effect . The secondary hypothesis test : 1 . That use Internet-based treatment program associate large decline cannabis consumption ( frequency quantity ) among individual regular cannabis use comparison access information Cannabis use harmful effect . 2 . That use Internet-based treatment program associate large decline alcohol consumption , depression anxiety increase sense coherence comparison access information Cannabis use harmful effect . 3 . That proportion individual seek professional help talk relatives friend reduce stop cannabis use great among use Internet-based treatment program among access information cannabis use harmful effect . Recruitment procedure baseline measure Study participant recruit advertisement Cannabishjalpen.se . Interested individual answer question gender , age , country birth , educational attainment , employment , marital status , live situation , cannabis use . The intervention group Individuals randomize intervention group directly randomization answer question alcohol use , use drug alcohol cannabis , depression , anxiety , sense context whether last 12 month receive professional help reduce quit cannabis use period raise issue relative friend . Further , fill survey Internet-based service individual wish reduce quit cannabis use . The study participant inform , within two day , gain access internet base treatment program design help quit cannabis use program opportunity communicate therapist . Within next two day , gain access internet-based treatment program , access two month contact three month answer question cannabis alcohol use , well previously mention issue . The control group Individuals randomize control group undergo exactly procedure intervention group . The difference control group inform three month gain access internet base treatment program design help quit cannabis use ( i.e . data collection follow-up complete ) . Otherwise , participant group opportunity use factual information available everyone Cannabishjalpen.se . Follow-up procedure Study participant randomize intervention group access intervention two month . Three month recruitment study , study participant group get automate email invitation participate three-month follow-up . The email include personalize link click redirect participant follow-up page ask answer question cannabis alcohol use , depression anxiety , seek professional help cannabis use well help family friend question whether used internet telephone service reduce quit cannabis use . The entire follow-up procedure complete via internet .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-Based Treatment Individuals With Regular Cannabis Use : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Age > 15 Cannabis use > 1 time/week last six month .
